titleStmt.title: The speech of Sir Dudly Carlton Lord Ambassadour for the King of Great Britaine made in the Assembly of the Lords the Estates Generall of the vnited Prouinces of the Low Countries. Being assembled at the Haghe. Touching the discord and troubles of the Church and policie, caused by the schismaticall doctrine of Arminius. Exhibited the 6. of October. 1617. Set forth by authoritie.
Oratie ghedaen door. English
titleStmt.author: Carleton, Dudley, Viscount Dorchester, 1573-1632.

titleStmt.title: The speech of Sir Dudly Carlton Lord Ambassadour for the King of Great Britaine made in the Assembly of the Lords the Estates Generall of the vnited Prouinces of the Low Countries. publicationStmt.publisher: printed by William Iones, for Nathaniel Browne, and are to be sold at the great north doore of Saint Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Oratie ghedaen door.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproductions of the originals in the Yale University Library ("Early English books, 1475-1640", reel 1060), and the British Library ("Early English newspapers", unit 24, reel 1153).
